name: Don't Fall (itch) (RoboZero)

Submission for 0-hour Game Jam 2022

Honesty:

Submitted after 3. Finished game at 2:53 EST. Learned about the jam at 1:40. 126 Lines of code. Not less than an hour, but not bad for a dead guy.

Thanks for playing :)
